channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SCOTUS upholds Trump's transgender military ban. And, the papal conclave begins
item.description: The Supreme Court has allowed the Trump Administration to start executing its ban on trans military service members. And, the conclave to elect the Ca...

item.title: The Fed will likely hold interest rates steady as Trump's tariffs spark uncertainty
item.description: The Federal Reserve will likely hold interest rates steady Wednesday as President Trump's tariffs threaten to raise prices and drag down economic grow...

item.title: Word of the Week: Before the Birdman of Alcatraz, the island was known for its birds

item.title: Fighting loneliness in rural Maine, one casserole at a time
item.description: What happens when people put their phones down and eat together?

item.title: More states are allowing community colleges to offer bachelor's degrees
item.description: Diminishing access to four-year universities and majors has been holding rural students back. Community colleges say they can bridge the gap.

item.title: Utah judge to decide if convicted killer with dementia can be executed

item.title: Mitsubishi in talks to source its new EVs for Australia, New Zealand from Foxconn unit
item.description: Mitsubishi Motors is in talks with Taiwan-based Foxconn's EV division to source an EV model for the Australia and New Zealand markets.

item.title: Amazon is working on an AI code generation tool

item.title: Most travelers must have a REAL ID now to fly within the US
item.description: REAL ID requirements for those flying within the United States begin after more than 20 years of delays.

item.title: OpenAI expects to cut share of revenue it pays Microsoft by 2030
